name: CompoundTax
description: Compound tax configuration for taxes calculated on top of other taxes (e.g., Quebec PST on GST, cascading taxes). Defines calculation sequence and base inclusion rules.

properties.name: tax
properties.description: Reference to the compound Tax entity

properties.name: baseTaxes
properties.description: List of taxes to include in the calculation base

properties.name: compoundSequence
properties.description: Order in which compound taxes are calculated (1, 2, 3...)

properties.name: includeSubtotal
properties.description: Whether to include the original subtotal in the base

properties.name: includeBaseTaxes
properties.description: Whether to include base tax amounts in calculation
